ygData.subject: Re: Heyers
ygData.msgSnippet: Answers below but ... you guys really don t know where to get Shiseido Mousse ah? ... From: LKW  Heh, me not just simi-RPer, u can call
ygData.messageBody:
Answers below but ... you guys really don't know where to get Shiseido
Mousse ah?
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Heh, me not just simi-RPer, u can call me full-time RPer. I played paper
AD&D since 1983, b4 Apple computer is even commonly available. I played
all the major RPG series like Might & Magic, Wizardry and Ultima series,
all from volume one (some played with my Apple computer). Actually I would
consider enchanter not someone powerful, but it's my dream to enchant
items, esp weapons. I know from a lvl 11 enchanter than EQ enchanter can
only enchant jewelry and silver bar, but that is better than none.
Hopefully they can patch this class later and allow us to enchant weapons,
hehe. It's a dream but just imagine, the RP element behind an enchanter,
hehe. Actually my UO friends ask me to start as a human monk or troll
shadow knight coz they r powerful & easier to train, but I really dun wanna
see duplication of my chars everywhere ;)
>>I remember you now! The Dark Wardens right?

Heh, actually other magery class r much better than enchanters when they
reach high lvl. I think enchanter as not as powerful as their magic
counterparts but I dun care. I might not even last to reach lvl 20 (due to
motion sickness), so meanwhile just RP someone I like ;)
>>Nice! I've been thinking of stopping my Monk and play a Shaman.
